Job Description: &;     Roles & Responsibilities     Work as part of a team developing applications and services using Agile development methods   Optimize for highperformance on both mobile and web   Writing and deploying clean and documented codes on Angular v2 and above, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3   Thorough understanding of the responsibilities of the platform, database, API, caching layer, proxies, and other web services used in the system   Writing non-blocking code, and resorting to advanced techniques such as multi-threading, when needed   Architecting and automating the build process for production, using task runners or scripts   Writing extensive unit tests using automated TDD tasks       Eligibility     Must Haves: Algorithms, Data Structure, Angular Js, Javascript   Development experience designing object oriented JavaScript and SVG   Applicable knowledge of web libraries and frameworks such as AngularJS, Polymer, and Closure   Solid knowledge in JavaScript is a must   Familiarity with GIT for version control   Aware of any Object Oriented JavaScript Frameworks (Backbone, Ember)
